articles.author: Marcus Wratten
articles.title: The Sandman creator Neil Gaiman denies sexual assault claims - PinkNews
articles.description: Neil Gaiman, the creator of queer favourite including The Sandman and Good Omens, has denied allegations of sexual assault by two women.
articles.content:
Neil Gaiman, the creator of queer favourite comics and TV series including The Sandman and Good Omens, has denied allegations of sexual assault brought by two women.
One of the women, aged 23, alleg… [+2433 chars]

articles.title: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel F: Critics split on Eddie Murphy's new film - BBC.com
articles.description: Many reviews praised the film for inspiring feelings of nostalgia, but some said it lacked energy.
articles.content:
Critics have given a mixed response to the fourth outing of Beverly Hills Cop, which sees Eddie Murphy and other cast members from the original 1984 film reunite.
